mapper.select: SELECT w.wishNum, w.productNum, p.productName, p.price, p.productImage FROM wish w JOIN product p ON w.productNum = p.productNum WHERE w.userID = #{userID} ORDER BY w.wishNum DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wish (wishNum, userID, productNum) VALUES (seq_wish.nextVal, #{userID}, #{productNum})
mapper.select: select count(*) from wish w join product p on w.productNum = p.productNum where w.productNum = #{productNum} and w.userID = #{userID}
